data.name: Spellshaper
data.detailed_description:
Spellshapers are a very selected group of individuals, the only ones that are born with the ability to control the source of magic. The most skilled ones are able to twist and shape their spells, in order to gain exceptional advantages in combat.
These heroes are the only hope to defeat the darkness, that is roaming freely in the world and threatening to destroy and corrupt all that remains.

Playing as a Spellshaper, you will have to find the most powerful bosses and defeat them, in order to end the darkness. But this is not an easy task. These bosses will prove to be very difficult to kill and a real test to your skills. Not only that, it will also show if the decisions that were made throughout the run were wise, weaker builds will certainly fail to conquer victory.

Upon killing monsters or exploring the world, you will gain different rewards and will be presented with options. The way you select these rewards will have a permanent effect on your character.

You will be able to find and modify spells at will, creating infinite combinations. You will need to choose the way you want to play your character, being a melee character, a spellcaster or simply a combination of everything.

Spellshapers will also collect items and different rewards that will contribute to strengthen their abilities and ensure their success. Items can be very powerful and affect many or all of the spells of your character. They might even have drawbacks, so choose carefully.

The world of Spellshaper is always changing and you will have to explore and find your way through a massive maze-like world. There is a big number of biomes, all connected in a continuous level. Every run will be different.

data.short_description: Fast paced roguelike with a heavy focus on spell crafting, that takes place in a random generated world, where you have to find and kill powerful bosses to defeat the darkness.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I5-8400 or AMD RYZEN 3 3300X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 1060 3 GB or AMD RADEON RX 580 4 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I7-8700K or AMD RYZEN 5 3600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE GTX 1070 8 GB or AMD RADEON RX VEGA 56 8 GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 8 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore.
